title: Power units will end financial year with 45 million tonnes of fuel: Coal minister Pralhad Joshi
description: Coal minister Pralhad Joshi expects power plants to end the financial year with 45 million tonnes of fuel, higher than last year. The overall coal stock is projected to be 150 million tonnes by March 31, supporting the summer season demand. The government plans to end coal import by 2030.
